text: The Women's Doubles tournament at the 1970 French Open was held from 25 May to 7 June 1970 on the outdoor clay courts at the Stade Roland Garros in Paris, France. The fourth-seeded team of Gail Chanfreau and Françoise Dürr won the title, defeating the first-seeded pair of Rosie Casals and Billie Jean King in the final in three sets. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== === Top half === ==== Section 1 ==== ==== Section 2 ==== === Bottom half === ==== Section 3 ==== ==== Section 4 ==== == References == ==External links== * Main draw *1970 French Open – Women's draws and results at the International Tennis Federation Women's Doubles Category:French Open by year – Women's Doubles Category:1970 in women's tennis
title: 1970 French Open – Women's Doubles
